import React, { useContext } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import ApplyCoupon from "./cart/ApplyCoupon"; import CartCheckOutButton from "./CartCheckOutButton"; import CartRow from "./CartRow"; import CartContext from "./context/cart/CartContext"; import Formatter from "./Formatter"; const Cart = () => { const cartContext = useContext(CartContext); const { cart, shippingCharge, couponValue } = cartContext; return (
{cart.length < 1 ? (

Whoops!!! It looks like your cart is currently Empty.

Don't worry, we got you covered. Click on{" "} Start Shopping to explore our goodies

) : (
{cart.length > 0 && cart.map((item) => { return ; })}
Product Qtd Quantity Unit price Total price

Order Details

Subtotal
{Formatter.format( cart .map((item) => item.price * item.qty) .reduce( (prev, next) => parseInt(prev) + parseInt(next), 0 ) )}
Coupon 'New customer'
-{Formatter.format(couponValue)}
New Subtotal
{/* substract coupon value here */} {Formatter.format( cart .map((item) => item.price * item.qty) .reduce( (prev, next) => parseInt(prev) + parseInt(next), 0 ) - couponValue )}
Shipping Charge
{Formatter.format(shippingCharge)}
Total
{Formatter.format( cart .map((item) => item.price * item.qty) .reduce( (prev, next) => parseInt(prev) + parseInt(next), 0 ) - couponValue - shippingCharge )}
)}
); }; export default Cart;
